Build: Generate production APK and fix all build errors

This commit includes the successfully built production APK and all fixes required to build it.

Changes:
- Fixed build configuration errors \(typos, syntax issues\)
- Updated Android Gradle Plugin from 7.3.0 to 8.7.3
- Updated Kotlin from 1.7.10 to 2.1.0
- Updated Java compatibility from 1.8 to 17
- Fixed MainActivity.kt import syntax error
- Added missing Android permissions \(INTERNET, LOCATION, etc.\)
- Created ProGuard rules for Stripe SDK
- Fixed Material Design library configuration
- Updated README with build information and APK download instructions
- Added release APK \(67.3MB\) to repository

- APK Size: 67.3MB
- Target: Android API 34
- Minimum: Android API 21+
